title: 开发1.12MOD中一直无法加载ItemBlock的材质
txt_content:
源码：https://github.com/JackWisdom/JacksOres
错误代码：

[20:21:05] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Could not load vanilla model parent 'jore:blocks/copper_ore' for 'net.minecraft.client.renderer.block.model.ModelBlock@53c1792d
net.minecraftforge.client.model.ModelLoaderRegistry$LoaderException: Exception loading model jore:blocks/copper_ore with loader VanillaLoader.INSTANCE, skipping
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: jore:models/blocks/copper_ore.json
[FML]: Exception loading model for variant jore:copper_ore#inventory for item "jore:copper_ore", normal location exception:
java.lang.IllegalStateException: vanilla model 'net.minecraft.client.renderer.block.model.ModelBlock@53c1792d' can't have non-vanilla parent

[20:21:10] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Exception loading model for variant jore:copper_ore#inventory for item "jore:copper_ore", blockstate location exception:
net.minecraftforge.client.model.ModelLoaderRegistry$LoaderException: Exception loading model jore:copper_ore#inventory with loader VariantLoader.INSTANCE, skipping
